plugins.description: Mica Tables SPSS is a plugin that reads data dictionaries from SPSS files. It does not provide statistical services such as basic summaries or contingency tables.
plugins.author: OBiBa
plugins.title: SPSS
plugins.name: mica-tables-spss

plugins.description: Opal search engine based on Elasticsearch 2.4.5. Can be used embedded in Opal (default) or configured to connect to an Elasticsearch cluster.

plugins.title: Opal Search ES

plugins.description: Reads/writes variables and data from/to a delimited file using R package readr.
plugins.title: ReadR
plugins.author: OBiBa

plugins.description: Reads variables and data from a Excel file using R package readxl. Writes data to a Excel file using R package writexl.
plugins.title: ReadXL
plugins.author: OBiBa
plugins.name: opal-datasource-readxl

plugins.description: Reads variables and data from a Google Spreadsheet using R package googlesheets4. This package is still in development and only supports publicly shared documents.
plugins.title: GoogleSheets
plugins.author: OBiBa
plugins.name: opal-datasource-googlesheets4
